name: City Bravo! Business Hen
overview: City Bravo! Business Hen is the sequel to Altron's City Bravo released in 1999, this sequel features more business. In city bravo business-hen the player can again build and design his own city: choose the industries, factories, shopping centers, buildings, decide what to build or construct. A lot of different buildings, industries and other city facilities are featured. It's up to the player to decide what kind of city he wanted to create. The game features a complete tutorial in japanese of all the different business and items that the player can control in the game.
